meanings.definition: An item that is part of a larger item.
meanings.sent1: The subitems in the box were neatly organized.
meanings.sent2: I need to purchase some subitems for my project.
meanings.sent3: The subitems decided to have a party without the main item.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like the subitems that completed the whole.
meanings.sent5: The subitems sparkled like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.

meanings.definition: A smaller item within a larger category.
meanings.sent1: The online store offers various subitems for sale.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to check the subitems before making a decision.
meanings.sent3: The subitems in the store were playing hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were like subitems that added depth to the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The subitems stood out like stars in the night sky.
